text: Massive waterlogging in Koramangala, Bengaluru after the heavy downpour. Traffic is a nightmare.
Just saw thick smoke coming from a building near MG Road. Looks like a serious fire in Bengaluru.
The Andheri subway in Mumbai is completely flooded again. Public transport has been severely affected. #MumbaiRains
The ring road is completely gridlocked. This traffic disaster in Bangalore is getting worse every day.
